Posts.Content: Trudie my heart goes out to you. I am sorry to hear you have not had support you need. Try just to do the most important things and leave what can be left. Your health is much more important. Have you any friends who could help you get on top of things? Sometimes they don't like to offer for fear of offending but would be only too happy to help if asked. this is a really good group for sharing your feelings as no one judges. Xxx
Posts.Title: feeling very low I am 15 months on but still in pain and weak

Posts.Content: Hi can anyone tell me if it is ok to have gel overlays on my nails whilst taking letrozole?
Posts.Title: Letrozole and gel nails
